reasoning: Reporting incidence of myelofibrosis (including primary and secondary). Global incidence ~0.5-1.5 per 100k person-years, using midpoint estimate of 0.8.
source: Rollison DE et al. (2008). Epidemiology of myelodysplastic syndromes and chronic myeloproliferative disorders in the United States, 2001-2004. Br J Haematol. 142(3):395-404
